name: CG Scroll To Top
author: Chandan Garg

sections.description:
Are you looking for easy and best wordpress plugin to navigate top of your webpage with great animations ?
CG Scroll To Top provides a way to customize your webpage scroll down pointing with colours and dial size. It provides a custom setting page in wordpress admin which is very simple. So, you can easily customize your scroller information part easily.

More Information

Visit the Coders God website for documentation, support, and information.
sections.installation:
From WordPress.org

  1. Download CG Scroll To Top.
  2. Upload the ‘cg-scroll-to-top’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favourite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate CG Scroll To Top from your Plugins page.

From WordPress Admin Panel

  1. Click on Add new under Plugin menu.
  2. Type CG Scroll To Top in the input field and press enter.
  3. Install and Activate CG Scroll To Top from listing.
sections.faq:
Can I use my existing WordPress theme?

Yes! CG Scroll To Top works out-of-the-box with every WordPress theme.

Where can I find documentation?

It can be found at Our website, look at http://codersgod.com/web-plugins/cg-scroll-to-top.

Where can I report a bug?

Report bugs, suggest ideas, and partcipate in development at http://codersgod.com/web-plugins/cg-scroll-to-top.
Share your thoughts and feedback to make it better.
sections.changelog:
3.5

Issue Fixes

  • Fixed issue with screens at which you want to show the loader. Previously if only post was selected, pages were showing squared scroll to top icon. Thanks to Goran Saveski for pointing this issue.

3.4

Issue Fixes

  • Fixed Custom image url input field focus issue.
  • Fixed Save button issue in backend.
  • Fixed Bootstrap theme conflicts.
  • Removed static stylings from scrollable elements.
  • Added ability to scroll to top instantly after choosing 0 as scroll speed option.

Newly Added Functionality

  • Added ability to upload custom arrow icon

3.3

  • Top Quality Designs.
  • Unlimited Options to choose icons.
  • Option to upload your custom icon as scroll to top icon.
  • Different Options to choose at settings page.

3.2

  • Issues fixes of in_array() at line 194.
  • Fixed default values if no values are updated for any field.

3.1

  • Fixed issues of jQuery conflicts.

3.0

  • Added option to show scroll to top at selected pages types. By Default, it will be shown at all pages.
  • Added option to customize your scroll to top icon background color so that you can customize as per your theme.
  • Added option to customize your scroll to top animation speed by which you scroll to top. You can now increase/decrease the scrolling speed.
  • Added option to increase/decrease your Dial thickness.
  • Added option to control height from top, at which you want to show the scroll to top icon at your screen.

1.0

  • Initial Release.

short_description: CG Scroll To Top is an awesome wordpress plugin to scroll top of your webpage with custom animations and lot's of customizations.
description:
Are you looking for easy and best wordpress plugin to navigate top of your webpage with great animations ?
CG Scroll To Top provides a way to customize your webpage scroll down pointing with colours and dial size. It provides a custom setting page in wordpress admin which is very simple. So, you can easily customize your scroller information part easily.

More Information

Visit the Coders God website for documentation, support, and information.

screenshots.caption: Custom scroller - Blue color in the image shows the part of webpage scrolled and the unfilled part shows remaining contents in the page
Scroller info - It shows area of webpage left unread. Clicking on it will take you to the top of the page with animated effects.
Custom Scroller Design - It shows the admin panel from where you can customize your designs. Its very simple and easy to choose.
Custom Scroller Settings - It shows different options to choose for designing your own scroll to top icon as per your theme.
